## SendableSeisFluid.sendSAI() method

Send SAI tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendSAI(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish, overrides?: SeisTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentSeisFluidTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of SAI to send. |
|  overrides | [SeisTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |
